Text: I'm smelling a zionist here. we will do whatever we want with our lands, why in the hell does other have to bother with it. whether we live like rats or lions, its our choice, our lands our place, our people, so stop interfering.....

Jerusalem is NOT MENTIONED EVEN ONCE in the Quran!

STOP THE B.S. !!

@nutella59 :- you zionist puppet, Jerusalem is mentioned several times in Quran and Ahadiths. Go check it out. In Qur'aan, Jerusalem is not mentioned by the name Jerusalem but rather mentioned as "holy land", But in Hadiths , its mentioned by both names.
